item.description:
While there isn't a movie to entertain us, we can amuse ourselves among ourselves.

Let's talk about our favorite movies and movies we wish we had never seen.

Before you go to or come from home, the gym, work, dinner, or wherever, meet up with a few drinking buddies for a minute or two or three or four or more...however long you're able.

The weather on past Monday evenings has been ideal to be outside and hang out in this cool setting...enjoying the company of friendly fun folks.

Courtyard Menu

Cocktail Menu

Check out  MBTA or   Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Charles/MGH (red line) is the closest subway station and steps away. Government (green & blue lines) subway station is less than a ten (10) minute walk.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for directions to the Courtyard from the doorman at the hotel entrance or follow the signs to the Courtyard.
item.name: Drinks in the Yard at Liberty Hotel - Monday July 25th
